Package edu.lehigh.cse216.jub424.backend.data_structure

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
edu.lehigh.cse216.jub424.backend.data_structure.Comment
public class Comment extends Object
Comments holds information of each comment. Because we will ultimately be converting instances of this object into JSON directly, we need to make the fields public. That being the case, we will not bother with having getters and setters... instead, we will allow code to interact with the fields directly.

  • Constructor Details

    • Comment

      public Comment(int idea_id, String user_id, int com_id, String content)
      constructor of the comment class, create a new comment with id of idea, user, and comment. Also provide the content of the comment
      Parameters:
      idea_id - id of the idea which the comment related to
      user_id - id of the user who post the comment
      com_id - id of the comment, should be unique
      content - the content of the comment
